Start with a coordinate 
```{r}
testshoe<-shoe_coord(shoe05_1)
```

```{r}
testpca<-prcomp(testshoe, center = TRUE,scale. = FALSE)
```

```{r}
summary(testpca)
```

```{r}
rotat<-testpca$rotation
rotat
```


```{r}
testshoe2<-shoe_coord(shoe05_2)
```

```{r}
testpca2<-prcomp(testshoe2, center = TRUE,scale. = FALSE)
```

```{r}
rgl::plot3d(testpca$x, aspect="iso")
rgl::plot3d(testpca2$x*matrix(c(-1, 1, -1), byrow = T, nrow = nrow(testpca2$x), ncol = 3), aspect="iso", col="blue", add=TRUE)
```
